reviewText: I was looking for this movie with spanish subtitles for a long time, and finally I found it. Then, I ordered it. But, oh surprise and dissapointment! There weren't spanish subtitles, only english subtitles. I live in Colombia, South America, and is very complicated for me return items. So, I kept the movie, watched it, and missed very important dialogs. It is sad, especially when you have waited for so long.
